title: Sidereus nuncius magna longeque, admirabilia spectacula pandens, suspiciendáque proponens unicuique, præsertim vero philosophis atque astronomis, quæ à Galileo Galileo ... : atque Medicea sidera nuncupandos decrevit.
author: Galilei, Galileo, 1564-1642.
publicationStmtPublisher: Typis Jacobi Flesher, prostat apud Cornelium Bee ...,
